synopsis.text:
Who will come out on top when two talented high school basketball players, Akane Tachibana and Hitonari Hiiragi, face off on the court? Once rivals, then teammates, and now adversaries once again, the two must navigate the pressures of family expectations, personal ambition, and team loyalty as they each pursue their own path in the sport they love.

Hitonari, a skilled player who has always been overshadowed by his college-level basketball star brother, joins the Kouzu High basketball team, where he must work with a sub-par team and compete against his friend and rival, Tachibana. But when the elite Tsurugizaki high school tries to recruit Hitonari, tensions rise and the two must face off once again.

Based on the manga "I'll" by Hiroyuki Asada, this two-part OVA follows the story of the match between Kouzu High School and the Kokutai Training Camp Association, as well as the friendship and rivalry between Tachibana and Hiiragi. Will Hitonari choose to stay loyal to his team and friends, or will he leave in pursuit of greater glory? Find out in this thrilling and emotional tale of basketball, friendship, and ambition.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
